This is a personal project created to shared my own recipes with everyone

## ðŸš€ Instructions:

1.  **Run this command**

    ```shell
    gatsby develop
    ```

1.  **URL to see the page**

    http://localhost:8000/

1.  **URL to GraphiQL**

    http://localhost:8000/___graphq


1.  **Stop the server or kill the process**
    ```shell
    kill -9 $(lsof -ti:8000)
    ```

1.  **Build production release**

    ```shell
    gatsby build
    ```
